alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 01 at 9:40PM EST until January 04 at 10:25PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. For the Kentucky River...including Whitesburg, Hazard, Jackson, Oneida, Booneville, Heidelberg, Ravenna...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM EST Saturday the stage was 23.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 PM EST Saturday was 23.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 29.0 feet early Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 28.6 feet on 05/10/2009. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by 9 AM Sunday.
